Latitude: OPTIONAL (decimal format, can be obtained at http://www.spatialepidemiology.net/user_maps/)
Longitude: OPTIONAL (decimal format, can be obtained at http://www.spatialepidemiology.net/user_maps/)
Sanger Lane: OPTIONAL (only if genomes were sequenced at the WTSI)
filename: REQUIRED (must exactly match the assembly file name, extension .fa .fasta .fna)
